title: Apple and blackberry crumble
description: Paul Hollywood adds a twist to the traditional crumble topping with the addition of seeds, oats and shony, a sweet and salty powdered seaweed. Serve with custard, cream or ice cream.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 20x25cm/8x10in ovenproof dish.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz cooking apples, peeled, cored and sliced
75g/2½oz unsalted butter, chilled, cut into roughly 1cm/½in cubes
